articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Russia says talks on US peace plan for Ukraine 'are proceeding constructively' - NPR
articles.description: A Kremlin envoy says peace talks in Florida on a U.S.-proposed plan to end the war in Ukraine are proceeding constructively, after U.S. meetings with Ukrainian and European officials in Berlin.
articles.content:
A Kremlin envoy says peace talks on a U.S.-proposed plan to end the nearly four-year war in Ukraine were pressing on "constructively" in Florida.
The talks are part of the Trump administration's mon… [+1584 chars]
